pages.text: Advanced witches are extremely meticulous about their choice of attire. Everything matters here – from the composition of the leather to the angle of the hat's brim. Leather, or more precisely, enchanted leather, is one of the most common materials for crafting the garments wizards are accustomed to wearing. $(br)The process of creating enchanted leather is not very quick, but it is entirely worth it. One should start with $(l:brewing/wet_enchanted_leather)enchanting$().

pages.title: Drying
pages.text: Next, the leather needs to be dried, evaporating the $(l:components/salt)salt$() that was used earlier. The $(l:odour_extracting/odour_extracting_furnace)Odour Extracting Furnace$() is perfect for this purpose. Fear not – the leather will not be burned, only dried.
